Content_wSideColumn.BodyCopy:
News & Notes is the official BYU-Idaho employee newsletter and is published monthly. The publication is intended to inform, educate, and unify employees through meaningful articles regarding academic initiatives, university innovations, campus events, human-interest stories, and other feature-rich content.

Story Ideas

We want to hear from you! Without meaningful content, News & Notes doesn't exist. Please tell us about important and/or interesting ongoings in your areas. These can include new academic initiatives, curriculum enhancements, contest winners, student success stories, faculty research and classroom application, and much more.

Announcements

Employess may submit announcements for publication in News & Notes if they are directly related to a campus organization or department. Examples of approved announcements include university events, deadlines, and policies.

For Sale Items

Employees may list personal items they would like to sell. Items not permitted for publication include private revenue-generating enterprises, items for sale by other businesses, or items you are selling for other people. Please include a short description of the item for sale, price, and contact information.

If you have suggestions, ideas, or submissions for News & Notes, please send them to newsdesk@byui.edu.
